channel.title: Machine Learning on iamtu
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on iamtu

item.title: Simulation Based Inference
item.description: Simulation Based Inference Imagine we have some black-box machine, such machine has some knobs and levels so we can change its inner configurations. The machine churn out some data for each configuration. The simulation based inference (SBI) solve the inverse problem; that is given some data, estimate the configuration (Frequentist approach), or sampling the configuration from posterior distribution (for Bayesian approach). For a formal definition and review of current methods for SBI, see this paper.
